# Bueno Framework - LLM Context File

## Project Overview
Bueno is a **Bun-native full-stack framework** designed from the ground up to leverage Bun's exceptional performance and modern JavaScript capabilities. It provides a complete ecosystem for building web applications with zero dependencies and zero configuration.

- **Version**: 0.8.5
- **Type**: Bun-native full-stack framework
- **Repository**: https://github.com/buenojs/bueno
- **NPM Package**: @buenojs/bueno

## Key Features
Bueno includes a comprehensive set of features out of the box:

### Core Features
- **HTTP & Routing**: Powerful and intuitive routing system with full HTTP method support
- **Dependency Injection**: Built-in IoC container inspired by NestJS
- **Middleware**: Comprehensive middleware system with built-in utilities and custom support
- **Modules System**: NestJS-inspired modular architecture with decorators
- **Database**: Multi-database support with migrations and schema builder
- **Validation**: Zero-dependency built-in validation system with external library support (Zod, Valibot, ArkType)
- **Security**: Comprehensive security features including JWT, CSRF, RBAC, and API key authentication
- **RPC Client**: Type-safe API client generation for frontend-backend communication
- **Caching & Sessions**: Redis-backed caching and session management
- **Distributed Locking**: Redis or in-memory lock system for distributed operations
- **Static Site Generation (SSG)**: Markdown-supported static site generation
- **Storage**: S3-compatible storage and secrets management
- **WebSocket**: Real-time communication support
- **Logging**: Flexible logging with multiple transports
- **Health Checks**: Built-in health check endpoints
- **Testing**: Comprehensive testing utilities for unit and integration tests
- **Background Jobs**: Job queue system with Redis and memory drivers
- **Notifications**: Multi-channel notification system (email, SMS, WhatsApp, push notifications)
- **Observability**: Structured error tracking with support for custom reporters (Sentry, Bugsnag, Datadog)
- **Metrics**: Runtime metrics collection (memory, CPU, event loop lag) with Prometheus format export
- **i18n**: Internationalization support with translation loading and locale negotiation
- **OpenAPI**: Automatic OpenAPI documentation generation

### Frontend Support
- **React**: Full support with SSR and hydration
- **Vue**: Server-side rendering with Vue 3
- **Svelte**: SvelteKit-like experience
- **Solid**: SolidJS with SSR
- **Features**: SSR, SSG, ISR, Islands architecture, file-based routing, HMR

## GraphQL Library Status
The GraphQL library is currently a **work in progress**. All other features are available in version 0.8.5. The GraphQL implementation includes:

- Decorator-based schema definition (@Resolver, @Query, @Mutation, @ObjectType, @Field, etc.)
- Full DI integration (guards, interceptors work on resolvers)
- Pluggable engine (built-in lightweight engine or graphql-js/Yoga via adapter)
- Subscriptions via WebSocket (graphql-transport-ws protocol)
- GraphiQL playground
- Unified types: one class for both GraphQL and REST/OpenAPI (opt-in)

## Architecture Overview

### Project Structure
```
my-bueno-app/
├── server/                  # Backend application
│   ├── main.ts             # Entry point
│   ├── modules/            # Feature modules
│   ├── common/             # Shared utilities
│   ├── config/             # Configuration
│   └── database/           # Database files
├── client/                 # Frontend application
│   ├── pages/              # File-based routes
│   ├── components/         # UI components
│   ├── layouts/            # Page layouts
│   └── main.tsx            # Entry point
├── shared/                 # Shared types and utilities
├── tests/                  # Test files
├── bueno.config.ts         # Framework configuration
└── package.json
```

### Core Modules
- `src/index.ts`: Main entry point
- `src/cli/`: CLI commands and project generation
- `src/database/`: Database connection, query builder, and schema management
- `src/modules/`: Modular architecture system
- `src/frontend/`: Frontend framework support and rendering
- `src/middleware/`: Middleware system and built-in middleware
- `src/validation/`: Validation system
- `src/security/`: Security features
- `src/rpc/`: RPC client generation
- `src/cache/`: Caching and session management
- `src/lock/`: Distributed locking
- `src/ssg/`: Static site generation
- `src/storage/`: Storage system
- `src/websocket/`: WebSocket support
- `src/logger/`: Logging system
- `src/health/`: Health check system
- `src/testing/`: Testing utilities
- `src/jobs/`: Background job queue system
- `src/notification/`: Multi-channel notification system
- `src/observability/`: Error tracking and observability
- `src/metrics/`: Runtime metrics collection
- `src/i18n/`: Internationalization support
- `src/openapi/`: OpenAPI documentation generation
- `src/graphql/`: GraphQL support (work in progress)

## Development Setup

### Prerequisites
- Bun runtime (version 1.3.0 or higher)

### Installation
```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/buenojs/bueno.git
cd bueno

# Install dependencies
bun install

# Run tests
bun test

# Start development server
bun dev
```

### Build
```bash
# Build for production
bun build

# Build only CLI
bun run build:cli

# Type checking
bun run typecheck

# Linting
bun run lint
```

## CLI Commands
Bueno provides a comprehensive CLI for project management:

### Project Creation
```bash
bueno new my-app              # Create new project
bueno new my-api --template api  # Create API-only project
```

### Development
```bash
bueno dev                     # Start development server
bueno build                   # Build for production
bueno start                   # Start production server
```

### Code Generation
```bash
bueno generate controller UserController  # Generate HTTP controller
bueno generate service AuthService       # Generate injectable service
bueno generate module AuthModule         # Generate feature module
bueno generate migration add_users_table # Generate database migration
```

### Database Management
```bash
bueno migration up            # Run pending migrations
bueno migration down          # Rollback migrations
bueno migration status        # Show migration status
```

### Help
```bash
bueno help                    # Display help information
```

## Testing
Bueno uses Bun's built-in test runner:

```typescript
import { AppTester, mock, assertions } from '@buenojs/bueno/testing';
import { describe, it, expect, beforeEach } from 'bun:test';

describe('UserController', () => {
  let tester: AppTester;
  
  beforeEach(async () => {
    tester = await AppTester.create(AppModule);
  });
  
  it('should create user', async () => {
    const response = await tester
      .post('/users')
      .body({ name: 'John', email: 'john@example.com' })
      .execute();
    
    expect(response.status).toBe(201);
  });
});
```
